title: Confessions of Her
description: Based on a true story, Confessions of Her is the debut poetry novel by Cindy Cherie. It is a tale of survival depicting how one young woman found love in herself, rather than searching for it in the arms of another. This autobiographical collection of poetry and prose takes the reader on a journey of love and loss, depicting how she overcame heartbreak to ultimately, save herself.
author: Cindy Cherie
